attributes.action: Ban fireworks from been set off daily
attributes.additional_details: Animals are suffering aswell as environment the air in smoky animals are shaking in fear due to the loud noises one night yes but over several is a bit much people with health conditions will also suffer due to all smoke
attributes.background: Ban fireworks and only allow them to go off on bonfire night and to see in new year not before or after

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Set dates when fireworks are allowed - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700537
